name: Feast of blood
description:
Feast of blood

In a world where all the vampires were exterminated, you were one of the few bloodsuckers who could escape punishment. Now you have to survive in a harsh world where everything is set against you. How long can you hold out? Visiting the night city, you will have to drink the blood of its inhabitants and carefully hide the traces of their crimes in all possible ways. Hide in the back streets waiting for the victim, or merge with the crowd of ordinary people? You decide. The main thing is not to reveal your true identity, because the guards are always on the alert.

Controls

E - Interactive objects.

Hold E - Drink BLOOD

LeftShift - Run

WASD or Arrows - Walking.
